GSP31jaymangu:750: yaścodāsīnaḥ sa sākṣyapi bhavati pradhānasambandhinaḥ kriyākalāpasya nirguṇatvāt //
GSP31jaymangu:752: nanu ca yadyakartā tatkathaṃ- bhoktṛbhāvādasti puruṣaḥ- ? tathā cāhuḥ-
GSP31jaymangu:754: puruṣo 'pi viṣayaphalānāṃ svayamakṛtānāṃ tathāpi bhoktā // iti //
GSP31jaymangu:757: nanu ca yadyacetanamavyaktaṃ kathaṃ dehendriyasaṃjñamadhiṣṭhānaṃ dharmādharmādiṣu pravarttate,
GSP31jaymangu:761: tena puruṣeṇa yaḥ saṃyogastasmādacetanaṃ cetanāvadiva bhavati /
GSP31jaymangu:764: yadi tadeva triguṇātmakaṃ kartṛ na pumān, kathaṃ puruṣo gacchatītyucyata
GSP31jaymangu:768: bhavati, tathā guṇātmakaliṅgasaṃyogādakartāpi san karteva bhavati /
GSP31jaymangu:770: yathā svāmī svayamayoddhāpi yaudhabhṛtyasaṃyogād yoddheti vyapadiśyate, tathā puruṣo 'pyupacāreṇa karteti /
GSP31jaymangu:775: nanu pradhānapuruṣayoḥ kiṃ (kartṛtvaṃ) caitanyārthameva saṃyogaḥ, kiṃ
GSP31jaymangu:782: viṣayopabhogaśca pradhānavibhūtimantareṇa na sambhavati, iti darśanārthaṃ puruṣaḥ
GSP31jaymangu:785: dṛṣṭvā sa sarvāṃ vibhūtimanubhūya virasatvād viraktaḥ puruṣaḥ pradhānena tyajyate /
GSP31jaymangu:786: tyaktasya kaivalyamityato darśanārthaṃ kaivalyārthaṃ ca dvayorapi saṃyogo matsyodakavadudumbaramaśakaśca
GSP31jaymangu:789: paṅguḥ sacakṣuḥ paśyati panthānaṃ na saṃcarati, andho 'pi saṃcarati na paśyati panthānam
GSP31jaymangu:791: tatra paṅgurandhaskandhamāruhya gatimān, andho 'pi draṣṭradhiṣṭhānāddṛṣṭimān jātaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:793: evaṃ puruṣo niṣkriyaḥ pradhānena saṃyujya tadvibhūtidarśanāya devādiṣu saṃcarati /
GSP31jaymangu:796: nanu ca saṃyogamātreṇa kathaṃ darśanaṃ kaivalyaṃ cetyāha- 'tatkṛtaḥ
GSP31jaymangu:804: prakṛtiḥ pradhānaṃ kāraṇamavyaktaṃ guṇasāmyaṃ tamobahulamavyākṛtamiti prakṛtiparyāyāḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:817: ṣoḍaśād gaṇādyāni pañca tanmātrāṇi tebhya ekottaravṛddhyā pañca mahābhūtāni bhavanti /
GSP31jaymangu:823: etairekādaśādayaḥ sthūlā viśeṣā ucyante, yeṣvavasitāni caturviṃśatitattvāni // 22 //
GSP31jaymangu:837: tapo jighatsāpipāsāśītoṣṇasthānasādhanājayaḥ kāṣṭhamaunākāramaune, vratāni ca kṛcchracāndrāyaṇādīni
GSP31jaymangu:853: / mahimā mahattvam, yena bhuvaneṣu dharmādiprāptiḥ, yena guṇeneṣitasya prāpaṇam /
GSP31jaymangu:855: / īśitvaṃ prabhutā (yena sthāvarādīni bhūtāni sandeśakārīṇi bhavanti /
GSP31jaymangu:875: rūpādiṣu viṣayeṣvabhimāno rūpavānaham, mamaite viṣayāḥ, ityahyaṅkāralakṣaṇam //
GSP31jaymangu:902: tatastaijasamahaṅkāraṃ kriyāśīlaṃ sahāyamapekṣyaikādaśakaṃ pañcakaṃ ca malājanayata (?) iti kārikā 26
GSP31jaymangu:930: buddhīndriyāṇāṃ karmendriyāṇāṃ ca svasvaviṣayagrahaṇakāle buddhīndriyaṃ karmendriyaṃ cetyarthaḥ
GSP31jaymangu:944: kathaṃ deśaniyamo vṛttiniyamaśca ? tatra tvagindriyaṃ sarvaśarīrasthitabāhyābhyantaravṛtti, cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇarasanāni śirasi bahiḥ pṛthak pṛthagavasthitāni bāhyavṛttīni /
GSP31jaymangu:948: ye cānye viṣayabhedā deśaniyamavṛtiniyamābhyāṃ te 'pi guṇapariṇāmaviśeṣādeva /
GSP31jaymangu:956: teṣu yathākramaṃ pañcānāṃ śrotrādīnāṃ buddhīndriyāṇāmālocanamātraṃ vṛttiriṣyate sāṃkhyācāryaiḥ
GSP31jaymangu:959: tathā hi buddhyavasitamarthaṃ puruṣaḥ cetayata iti siddhāntaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:960: karmendriyāṇāmapi vāgādīnāṃ yathākramaṃ vasanādānādīni vṛttayaḥ karmāṇi /
GSP31jaymangu:962: ādeyasyādānaṃ pāṇyoḥ, viharaṇaṃ deśāntaragamanaṃ pādayoḥ, utsarga āhāramalasyotsarjanaṃ pāyoḥ, ānandanamānado hlādaḥ śukravisṛṣṭisaṃsṛṣṭisukhaṃ tadupasthendriyavṛttiḥ // 28 //
GSP31jaymangu:976: eṣāṃ ca buddhyādīnāṃ trayodaśānāṃ caturvidhā vṛttiḥ, asāmānyāyugapatkramaśceti (?) //
GSP31jaymangu:980: śrotrasya yacchabdaprakāśanaṃ tacchrotrasyaiva, nānyeṣāṃ tvagādīnāṃ dvādaśānām /
GSP31jaymangu:982: sāmānyāmāha- 'sāmānyakaraṇavṛttiḥ'; iti sāmānyā cāsau karaṇavṛttiśceti sāmānyakaraṇavṛttiḥ
GSP31jaymangu:984: prāṇā ādyā yeṣāṃ vāyūnāṃ te prāṇādyāḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:988: yena kāye 'gnirdīpita āhāraṃ ca pacati sa samānaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:990: yaḥ sarvaśarīraṃ vyāpya sthitaṃ sa vyānaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:995: dṛṣṭe tathāpyadṛṣṭe trayasya tatpūrvikā vṛttiḥ // ISk_30 //
GSP31jaymangu:1001: tathā hi cakṣuṣālocitaṃ buddhyādhyavasitamahaṅkāreṇātmīkṛtaṃ manasā saṅkalpitamiti
GSP31jaymangu:1004: mandaprakāśe sthāṇupuruṣocitāmūrdhvatāṃ dṛṣṭavataḥ kiṃ sthāṇuḥ puruṣa iti vikalpaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1007: yeya(mubhaya)thāvṛttiḥ sā kasmin viṣaya ityāha - 'dṛṣṭe'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:1015: atha yadetaccatuṣṭayaṃ tatkiṃ yugapat parasparasavyapekṣaṃ svāṃ svāṃ vṛtiṃ pratipadyate kiṃ vā nirapekṣamityāha-
GSP31jaymangu:1017: puruṣārtha eva heturna kenacitkāryate karaṇam // ISk_31 //
GSP31jaymangu:1022: tatra bhūtāṃ parasparākūtahaitukīṃ vṛttiṃ catvāri karaṇāni pratipadyante /
GSP31jaymangu:1024: evaṃ buddhirahaṅkāro manaśca trayāṇāmākūtaṃ jñātvā 'dhyavasāyamabhimānaṃ saṅkalpanaṃ ca pratipadyante /
GSP31jaymangu:1030: tadvṛttiṃ jñātvā manaḥ, pracuraṃ ghṛtaṃ prāpayiṣyāmīti kiṃ stokamiti, saṅkalpayatīti /
GSP31jaymangu:1031: evaṃ bāhyānyapi karaṇāni svāṃ svāṃ vṛttiṃ parasparākūtahaitukīṃ pratipadyante //
GSP31jaymangu:1032: etāni kimātmārthaṃ svāṃ svāṃ vṛttiṃ pratipadyante, kimanyārthamityāha-
GSP31jaymangu:1036: nanvīśvaraḥ kartā jagataḥ, sa eva buddhyādikalāpaṃ sṛṣṭavān yena puruṣasyārthaḥ sampadyate
GSP31jaymangu:1040: pradhānavyatirekeṇa na kaścidbuddhyādikaraṇaṃ svāṃ svāṃ vṛttiṃ kārayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1043: niścetanatvāt prakṛteḥ sacetano 'dhiṣṭhātā kartā 'paro gaveṣyata iti cet,
GSP31jaymangu:1050: kāryaṃ ca tasya daśadhā, hāryaṃ dhāryaṃ prakāśyaṃ ca // ISk_32 //
GSP31jaymangu:1057: tatra kasya kā kriyā yadapekṣayā karaṇamityāha-
GSP31jaymangu:1064: tatra śabdasparśarūparasagandhāḥ pañca vacanādānaviharaṇotsargānandāḥ pañceti daśadhā /
GSP31jaymangu:1066: sūkṣmāstanmātralakṣaṇāḥ sukhaikasvabhāvatvāddivyāḥ, sthūlā ākāśādayaḥ sukhaduḥkhamohatmakatvādadivyā iti /
GSP31jaymangu:1077: antaḥkaraṇaṃ trividhaṃ daśadhā bāhyaṃ trayasya viṣayākhyam /
GSP31jaymangu:1087: tryavayavasyāntaḥkaraṇasya bāhyaṃ viṣaya ityākhyāyate, taddvāreṇa viṣayāvagāhanāt /
GSP31jaymangu:1088: tenāntaḥkaraṇasya dvividho viṣayaḥ- dvāraṃ bhogyaṃ ceti /
GSP31jaymangu:1092: kalyata iti kālaḥ viṣaya evātīto 'nāgato vartamānoścocyate
GSP31jaymangu:1095: tatra sāmprato vartamānaḥ kālo yasya bāhyasya taddhi bāhyam /
GSP31jaymangu:1105: yathā ca mano vartamānaṃ saṅkalpayatīti tathātītānāgatāvapi /
GSP31jaymangu:1106: tatra kimidaṃ bhūtaṃ syāt, na mameti /
GSP31jaymangu:1109: nanu ca yadi sthūlāḥ pṛthivyādayaste viśeṣāḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1113: vāgbhavati śabdaviṣayā śeṣāṇi tu pañcaviṣayīṇi // ISk_34 //
GSP31jaymangu:1115: teṣāmapi trayodaśānāṃ karaṇānāṃ yāni pañca buddhīndriyāṇi, tāni viśeṣāviśeṣaviṣayīṇi /
GSP31jaymangu:1116: śabdādayaḥ pañca viṣayā dvividhāḥ - viśeṣā aviśeṣāśca /
GSP31jaymangu:1121: ta eva viṣayā vidyante yeṣāmiti matvarthopaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1123: tatra śrotraṃ sthūlān nānāśabdānavikalān gṛhṇāti, śabdatanmātraṃ ca /
GSP31jaymangu:1124: nāsikā sthūlān surabhyādigandhān, tanmātraṃ ca gṛhṇātīti //
GSP31jaymangu:1126: kevalaḥ śabdo viṣayo yasyāḥ, na viṣayāntaramityarthaḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:1131: pāyurupasthaśca śabdādimadeva malaṃ śukraṃ ca visṛjati
GSP31jaymangu:1132: / anena dvāreṇa tu sarvaṃ bāhyaṃ karaṇaṃ pañcaviṣayameva draṣṭavyam /
GSP31jaymangu:1133: yaṃ hi yadevamāśritya (?) sphītaṃ tasya śabdasparśarūparasagandhavattvāt,
GSP31jaymangu:1138: tasmāt trividhaṃ karaṇaṃ dvāri, dvārāṇi śeṣāṇi // ISk_35 //
GSP31jaymangu:1143: triṣvapi kāleṣu vyavasthitaṃ viṣayamavagāhate gṛhṇāti yasmāt , tasmāt trividhamantaḥkaraṇaṃ buddhyādi dvāri bhavati /
GSP31jaymangu:1148: nanu ca yadyantaḥkaraṇaṃ bāhyakaraṇadvāreṇa sarvaṃ viṣayamavagāhate,
GSP31jaymangu:1151: kṛtsnaṃ puruṣasyārthaṃ prakāśya buddhau prayacchanti // ISk_36 //
GSP31jaymangu:1154: guṇaviśeṣāḥ, traya eva guṇā anyo 'nyābhibhavadvāreṇa pariṇatāḥ śrotrādivyapadeśabhāja ityarthaḥ
GSP31jaymangu:1157: ekasya yā vṛttiḥ svarūpaṃ ca, na taditareṣāmapi yadi syādetenaiva viṣayāvagāhanaṃ siddhaṃ kimanyena //
GSP31jaymangu:1159: trailokyagataṃ puruṣasyārthaṃ sūkṣmasthūlaviṣayalakṣaṇaṃ prakāśyābhivyaktiṃ nītvā paścādahaṅkārādayo dvādaśa buddhau prayacchanti,
GSP31jaymangu:1162: tasyāṃ ca viṣayopadhānoparaktyāṃ buddhau puruṣa upalabhate /
GSP31jaymangu:1166: nanu ca tulye karaṇatve kimityahaṅkārādayo buddhau prayacchanti /
GSP31jaymangu:1169: saiva ca viśinaṣṭi punaḥ pradhānapuruṣāntaraṃ sūkṣmam // ISk_37 //
GSP31jaymangu:1172: devamanuṣyatiryagyoniśu yo viṣayasyopabhogastaṃ prati sarvaṃ trailokyagataviṣayaṃ puruṣasya sādhayati, sampādayati /
GSP31jaymangu:1173: yasmādbuddhiḥ pradhānabhūtā satī nānyaḥ kaścit, tasmāt tāni karaṇāni buddhau prayacchanti
GSP31jaymangu:1178: yadā tamasvatī buddhirbhavati tadā sarvamupanītaṃ sampādayati /
GSP31jaymangu:1179: yadā sattvādhikā buddhirbhavati, tadā jñānasaṅgatā pradhānapuruṣāntaraṃ viśinaṣṭi /
GSP31jaymangu:1187: ete smṛtā viśeṣāḥ, śāntā ghorāśca mūḍhāśca // ISk_38 //
GSP31jaymangu:1192: lakṣyate, na ca kiñcit prakāśayati, tadvat te 'pyaviśeṣāḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:1200: te ca kiṃsvarūpā ityāha- 'śāntā ghorāśca mūḍhāśca'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:1201: śāntāḥ sukhapradāha ghorā duḥkhapradāḥ, mūḍhā mohapradā iti // 38 //
GSP31jaymangu:1204: sūkṣmā mātāpitṛjāḥ, saha prabhūtaistridhā viśeṣāḥ syuḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1207: ye sūkṣmāstanmātralakṣaṇāḥ saṃsāriṇaḥ śarīrasyāśrayatāṃ gatāste 'pi viśeṣāḥ, sūkṣmaśarīrasyārabdhatvāt
GSP31jaymangu:1214: yāni mahābhūtāni bāhyāni śāntaghoramūḍhānyuktāni tāni sthūlaśarīrasyāvakāśavyūhanapattikledanadhāraṇakartṛtvena prakṛṣṭabhūtānyucynte /
GSP31jaymangu:1232: tat, mahadādisūkṣmaviṣayāstanmātralakṣaṇāḥ paryantaṃ yasya tat sūkṣmaparyantam /
GSP31jaymangu:1244: citraṃ yathāśrayamṛte sthāṇvādibhyo vinā yathā cchāyā /
GSP31jaymangu:1251: tairvinā yathā cchāyā snigdhā paruṣā vā na tiṣṭhati //
GSP31jaymangu:1258: na ca nirādhāreṇa karaṇena puruṣasya saṃyogaḥ sambhavati /
GSP31jaymangu:1270_0: / yathaika eva naṭastaṃ taṃ viśeṣamāsthāya yavanikānto nirgatya rājāmātyaviduṣakādibhāvenānuviddho
GSP31jaymangu:1270_1: 'vatiṣṭhate, tathā liṅgamapi taṃ taṃ dehamāsthāya devamanuṣyatiryagbhāvena vyavatiṣṭhate //
GSP31jaymangu:1276: kimetatsarvamīśvarāt kiṃ vā svabhāvādityatrāha- 'prakṛteḥ vibhutvayogāt'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:1280: pradhānenaiva hi puruṣasyārthaḥ kartavya iti mahadādisūkṣmaparyantaṃ liṅgamutpādya dharmādibhiradhivāsayati
GSP31jaymangu:1309: tatra dharmeṇa yamaniyamalakṣaṇena gamanamūrdhvamiti, sūkṣmaśarīrasya devādivyavasthitirityarthaḥ
GSP31jaymangu:1321: yeṣāṃ prakṛtireva paratattvaṃ nānyat, teṣāṃ prakṛtivādināṃ prākṛtiko bandhaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1322: yeṣāmiṣṭāpūrtabhāvina eva divyādivyamānuṣabhogāḥ puruṣārtha iti, teṣāṃ karmavādināṃ dakṣiṇābandhaḥ
GSP31jaymangu:1329: yeṣāṃ vikāra evaiśvaryalakṣaṇaḥ puruṣārtha iti, teṣāṃ vikāratvavādināṃ vaikāriko bandhaḥ kārikā 45
GSP31jaymangu:1333_0: yo viṣayādidarśanādvirakto yamaniyamaparisthito na jñānaṃ paryeṣate, tasya mṛtasya
GSP31jaymangu:1333_1: vairāgyādaṣṭāsyu prakṛtiṣu pradhānāditanmātraparyantāsu layaḥ, sthūlaśarīreṇa viṣayopabhoganimittena
GSP31jaymangu:1333_2: yogaḥ tallīnaścātmānaṃ muktamiva manyate na tu muktam, sargakāle punaḥ saṃsaraṇāt /
GSP31jaymangu:1334: yadā tu jñānaṃ paryeṣyate tadā mucyata eva /
GSP31jaymangu:1337: ityevaṃ jāyate mokṣo mukta ātmastha ucyate // iti //
GSP31jaymangu:1347: eṣāmaṣṭānāṃ buddhirūpāṇāmekena mokṣaḥ saptabhirbandhaḥ saṃsāra iti yadetannimittanaimittikaṃ ṣoḍaśamuktaṃ tatsaṃkṣepeṇa caturvidhamāha -
GSP31jaymangu:1352: tasya sargo yaḥ ṣoḍaśavidha uktaḥ, eṣa viparyayāśaktituṣṭisiddhyākhyaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1357: tasya catuvidhasya punaḥ pañcāśat bhedā bhavanti /
GSP31jaymangu:1379: tayorvaikalyādaṣṭāviṃśatibhedā yasyāḥ aśakteḥ sā bhavatīti vibhaktipariṇāmena yojyam /
GSP31jaymangu:1395: tataśca teṣāmaṣṭāsveva prakṛtiṣu layo bhavatīti aṣṭavidhā avidyā, viṣayasyāṣṭavidhatvāt //
GSP31jaymangu:1398: devā api vināśino 'pi, aṣṭaguṇamaiśvaryamāśritā ātmānamavināśinaṃ manyante
GSP31jaymangu:1400: 'daśavidho mahāmohaḥ'; iti sukhānuśayo rāgo mahāmoha ityucyate /
GSP31jaymangu:1401: sa ca divyādivyaviṣayeṣu vartamāno daśavidho bhavati /
GSP31jaymangu:1406: sa cāṣṭaguṇaiśvarye daśavidhe ca viṣaye pratibhavatītyaṣṭādaśavidhaḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:1411: sa cāṣṭaguṇaiśvarye daśavidhe ca viṣaye pratibhavatītyaṣṭādaśavidhaḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:1416: sa cāṣṭaguṇaiśvarye daśavidhe viṣaya eva bhavatīti /
GSP31jaymangu:1431: buddherapi vadhā aśaktirupadiṣṭā // te kiyanta ityāha- 'saptadaśadhā ca buddhervupayayāstuṣṭisiddhīnām'; iti /
GSP31jaymangu:1436: nanu pratyayasarga ityuktam, nāyamindriyavadhaḥ pratyayasargaḥ kiñcidahaṅkārasarga iti satyam, ahaṅkārasya pratyayasargatvāt tatsargo 'pi
GSP31jaymangu:1442: bāhyā viṣayoparamāt pañca, nava tuṣṭayo 'bhimatāḥ // ISk_50 //
GSP31jaymangu:1446: saiva vyaktātmanā pariṇamya bandhamokṣau kuruta ityetāvanmātropadeśāt tuṣṭo bhavati yastasya prakṛtyākhyā tuṣṭirambha ityucyate //
GSP31jaymangu:1451: ityasmādadvitīyādupadeśādihaiva muktiḥ prāptavyeti parituṣṭaḥ pravrajito 'yaṃ tasya dvitīyā upādānākhyā tuṣṭiḥ salilamucyate //
GSP31jaymangu:1454: mokṣo na prakṛtyupādānamātrādihaiva janmanīti tasmāttṛtīyādupadeśāt tuṣṭo yaḥ kālāpekṣī sthitastasya kālākhyā tuṣṭirodha ityucyate //
GSP31jaymangu:1455: yasyāparaṃ bhāgyamasti tasya mokṣaḥ, prakṛtyupādānakālamātreṇa na,
GSP31jaymangu:1458: etāścatasra ātmānamadhikṛtya bhavantītyādhyātmikāḥ ātmanā moktavyamiti kṛtvā //
GSP31jaymangu:1462: tatra viṣayārjane mahadduḥkhaṃ tadalpaviṣayebhya ityārjanadoṣadarśanānnivṛttasya tuṣṭiriyaṃ pañcamī sutāramityucyate //
GSP31jaymangu:1463: viṣayā ārjituṃ śakyāḥ, rakṣaṇaṃ tu duḥkhaṃ bahubhiḥ tajjanyamānānāṃ (?)
GSP31jaymangu:1465: viṣayā ārjituṃ rakṣituṃ kṣaye ca pratividhātuṃ śakyāḥ, kintūpabhujyamānā mahatīmātmasaktiṃ kurvanti, tadaprāptau ca mahadduḥkhamiti
GSP31jaymangu:1467: sarvaṃ śakyaṃ kintvanupahatya bhūtāni na bhogaḥ sambhavati /
GSP31jaymangu:1468: bhūtopaghātānmahadaniṣṭaphalamiti hiṃsādoṣadarśanāduparatasya tuṣṭiriyaṃ navamī uttamāmbha ityucyate /
GSP31jaymangu:1471: tatra prakṛtyupādānakālā na mokṣopāyā ityupadiṣṭamapi yo vaimukhyānna pratipadyate tasyādhyātmikāścatasraḥ, viṣayoparamācca bāhyāḥ pañceti nava tuṣṭayaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1479: dānaṃ ca siddhayo 'ṣṭau, siddheḥ pūrvo 'ṅkuśastrividhaḥ // ISk_51 //
GSP31jaymangu:1483: janmāntarasaṃskṛtadhiyo yasya bandhamokṣakāraṇamutprekṣamāṇasya pradhānapuruṣāntarajñānamutpadyate tasya siddhirūhahetukā prathamā tāramityucyate //
GSP31jaymangu:1484: yasya sāṃkhyaśāstrapāṭhamanyadīyamākarṇya tattvajñānamutpadyate, sā siddhiḥ śabdahetukā dvitīyā sutāramityucyate //
GSP31jaymangu:1491: vā bhāvitastadvighātārthaṃ jñānaṃ paryeṣyati, ūhena śabdenādhyayanena vā,
GSP31jaymangu:1493: pūrvā yāstisraḥ siddhyayastā na duḥkhahetukā iti boddhavyāḥ
GSP31jaymangu:1495: yo 'dhigatatattvaḥ suhṛdaṃ prāpya jñānamadhigacchati, tasya suhṛtprāptipūrvikā /
GSP31jaymangu:1503: / yaḥ śakto 'pi sāṃkhyaśāstraṃ śṛṇvannapi buddhidaurbalyānna buddhyati tasya śabdahetukā asiddhiḥ
GSP31jaymangu:1505: yasya gurupūrvakaṃ nādhyayanaṃ buddhidoṣādeva tasyānadhyayanahetukā asiddhiḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1506: na yatra mitrasaṃgraho na ca dānamityaṣṭāvasiddhayo buddhivadhā aśaktāvantarbhūtāḥ
GSP31jaymangu:1510: tasyā aṣṭavidhāyāḥ siddheryaḥ pūrvo viparyayāśaktituṣṭyākhyastrividha uktaḥ so 'ṅkuśa ivetyaṅkuśa uktaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1512: tatra viparyayādiṣyate bandha iti vacanāt pañcavidhamajñānamaṅkuśaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1516: tadā prakṛtyupādānakālabhāgyā mokṣopāyā iti, viṣayoparamācca mukta ityetāvanmātrādupadeśāt tuṣṭo na jñānaṃ paryeṣyati /
GSP31jaymangu:1523: yogo viyogo bahavaḥ pumāṃsaḥ sthitiḥ śarīrasya ca śeṣavṛttiḥ // iti //
GSP31jaymangu:1530: ete ṣaṣṭi padārthāḥ, tadarthaṃ śāstraṃ ṣaṣṭitantramityucyate // 51 //
GSP31jaymangu:1532: pūrvotpannaṃ liṅgaṃ bhāvairadhivāsitaṃ saṃsaratītyuktam, tatra kiṃ bhāvā
GSP31jaymangu:1534: na vinā bhāvairliṅgam, na vinā liṅgena bhāvaniṣpattiḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1537: yadi bhāvā na pūrvotpannāstairvinā liṅgamapi nāsti /
GSP31jaymangu:1542: yasmādevaṃ tasmāt liṅgākhyo bhāvākhyaśca dviprakāraḥ pradhānatvāt sargo bhavatīti /
GSP31jaymangu:1545: yathā dvāvetau pūrvotpannau tatha bhūtasargo 'pīti darśayannāha-
GSP31jaymangu:1552: brāhmaḥ, prājāpatyaḥ, sauraḥ, āsuraḥ, gāndharvaḥ, yākṣaḥ, rākṣasaḥ,
GSP31jaymangu:1575: sthūlaśarīre sattvayi kaścideva kvacidadhikyena vartata iti darśayannāha-
GSP31jaymangu:1591: yadi triṣu lokeṣu liṅgaṃ saṃsarati, tadeva tarhi sāṃsārikaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vāpnoti, tasyaiva
GSP31jaymangu:1592: tatra jarāmaraṇakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāpnoti cetanaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1597: tatra mātuḥ kukṣau andhatamasīva praviṣṭasya saṅkucanaprasāraṇaduḥkhaṃ garbhaduḥkham /
GSP31jaymangu:1602: buddhyādhyavasitaṃ puruṣaḥ prāpnoti tasya cetanatvāt, na tu liṅgamacetanatvāditi bhāvaḥ
GSP31jaymangu:1612: īśvaraprerito gacchet svargaṃ vā śvabhrameva vā /
GSP31jaymangu:1614: puruṣa evedaṃ sarvaṃ yadbhūtaṃ yacca bhavyam /
GSP31jaymangu:1616: svabhāvikamevedaṃ sarvaṃ jagannahi marudādayaḥ kenacit kriyante /
GSP31jaymangu:1619: pratipuruṣavimokṣārthaṃ svārtha iva parārtha ārambhaḥ // ISk_56 //
GSP31jaymangu:1635: / ekaikasya puruṣasya puruṣasya vimuktyarthamārambhaḥ, puruṣāṇāṃ bahutvāt /
GSP31jaymangu:1637: tathāhi mokṣārthaṃ viṣayopabhogārthaṃ cāyamārambha iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP31jaymangu:1643: yaḥ kaścit devadattasvārtha eva parārtho rahititaṃ pravartate na parastapastakaroti (?) tathā pradhānamapītyarthaḥ // 56 //
GSP31jaymangu:1646: pradhānasyācetanatvātkathaṃ lokatraye puruṣaṃ viṣayaiḥ saṃyojya dhyānena vipramocya nivarteta
GSP31jaymangu:1658: yathā tṛṇadikamacetanaṃ gavāśitaṃ pītaṃ ca, vatsasya puṣṭiḥ kartavyeti,
GSP31jaymangu:1659: kṣīrātmanā pariṇamati kṛtārthaṃ ca nivartata iti // 57 //
GSP31jaymangu:1661: yadi puruṣavimokṣārthaṃ pradhānasya pravṛttiḥ, pravṛtteḥ prāk puruṣasya
GSP31jaymangu:1662: kaivalyaṃ sthitameva, tat kiṃ tena pravṛttena? tathā cāhuḥ -
GSP31jaymangu:1663: madhvarthaṃ prasthitaḥ kaścid grāmābhyāśe tu mākṣikam /
GSP31jaymangu:1664: akke cenmadhu vindeta kimarthaṃ parvataṃ vrajet // iti //
GSP31jaymangu:1669: yathautsukyanivṛttyarthamabhimatakriyāsu lokaḥ pravartate, tadvat pralayāvasthāyāṃ puruṣo 'pi mokṣanimittaṃ yadautsukyaṃ tannivṛttaye pravartayetpradhānamiti // 58 //
GSP31jaymangu:1672: raṅgasya darśayitvā nivartate narttakī yathā nṛttāt /
GSP31jaymangu:1673: puruṣasya tathā '; 'tmānaṃ prakāśya vinivartate prakṛtiḥ // ISk_59 //
GSP31jaymangu:1676: sā tathā raṅgasya nṛttaṃ darśayitvā tasmānnṛttānnivartate viramati, dṛṣṭāhamaneneti kṛtaprayojanā satī, tathā puruṣasyātmānaṃ saṃprakāśya devādibhāvarūpaṃ gatā nivartate
GSP31jaymangu:1679: nanu ca naṭī raṅgāt svārthaṃ sādhayati, prakṛtestu puruṣārthaḥ svārtho
GSP31jaymangu:1684: pūrvaṃ saptabhirdharmādibhirupāyaistriṣu viṣayeṣvātmanaṃ prakāśayatyupakāriṇī, tadanantaramekena jñānākhyena kaivalyaṃ kurvāṇopakāriṇī bhavati //
GSP31jaymangu:1692: tasya puṃso 'rtho dvividhaḥ- viṣayopabhogaḥ kaivalyaṃ ca /
GSP31jaymangu:1699: 'tmānaṃ prakāśayati, pumānapi na sarvathā paśyati ? tathā cāhuḥ-
GSP31jaymangu:1701: yattu dṛṣṭipathaṃ prāptaṃ tanmāyāvastu tucchakam // iti /
GSP31jaymangu:1703: prakṛteḥ sukumārataraṃ na kiñcidastīti me matirbhavati /
GSP31jaymangu:1704: yā dṛṣṭāsmīti punarna darśanamupaiti puruṣasya // ISk_61 //
GSP31jaymangu:1708: bhavati- prāgvyaktātmanā prakāśayati na tvavyaktātmanāpi, yena jñānāvasthāyāṃ prakṛtermatirbhavati mama sūkṣmataraṃ na kiñcidaparamasti yaddraṣṭavyaṃ puruṣeṇa //
GSP31jaymangu:1710: sā prakṛtirvyaktātmanā ca) dṛṣṭāhamaneneti na punardarśanamupaiti puruṣasya, draṣṭavyābhāvāt
GSP31jaymangu:1711: tataścaivaṃ sarvathā prakṛtirātmānaṃ prakāśayati, puruṣaścaitāṃ sarvathā paśyati // 61 //
GSP31jaymangu:1713: tasmānna puruṣasya bandho nāpi saṃsaraṇaṃ mokṣo vetyāha-
GSP31jaymangu:1714: tasmānna badhyate 'ddhā na mucyate nāpi saṃsarati kaścit /
GSP31jaymangu:1715: saṃsarati badhyate mucyate ca nānāśrayā prakṛtiḥ // ISk_62 //
GSP31jaymangu:1722: kasya tarhi bandhādaya ityāha- saṃsarati badhyate mucyate ca prakṛtiriti /
GSP31jaymangu:1723: nanu ca tasyāḥ sukumāratvādbandhādayo na sambhavantyevetyatrāha-
GSP31jaymangu:1735: saivātmanaiva puruṣārthaṃ pratyātmānaṃ mahadādisūkṣmaparyantaṃ liṅgaṃ badhnāti /
GSP31jaymangu:1745: yaṃ puruṣamapekṣya jñānamutpādayati taṃ pratyavyaktamātmānaṃ saṃharatītyarthaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1758: yadetat sūkṣmaśarīraṃ bhautikaṃ ca tasminna bhavāmi, api tu prakṛtiḥ //
GSP31jaymangu:1770: prakṛtiṃ paśyati puruṣaḥ prekṣakavadavasthitaḥ svasthaḥ // ISk_65 //
GSP31jaymangu:1772: yat prakṛtijñānamutpadyate taṃ prati nivṛtaḥ prasavo liṅgabhūtasargākhyo yasyāḥ prakṛteḥ sa tathoktā /
GSP31jaymangu:1773: prasavanivṛttyā vā yo viṣayo viṣayebhyo nivartate tadvaśāt, saptabhyo rūpebhyo dharmādibhyo
GSP31jaymangu:1778: yathā prekṣakaḥ pravarttitanṛttamupasaṃhṛtanṛttāṃ ca narttakīṃ paśyati, tathā puruṣo 'pi
GSP31jaymangu:1781: ātmani sthito na prakṛtisthaḥ, tataḥ prakṛternivṛttatvāt // 65 //
GSP31jaymangu:1783: nanu ca yadi prakṛtirgarbhabhūḥpuruṣaṃ prati nivṛttaprasavā, tasyāśca prakṛtestadānīṃ sarvagatatvādastyeva saṃyogastatkimiti punaḥ śarīrotpattirna bhavatītyāha -
GSP31jaymangu:1785: sati saṃyoge 'pi tayoḥ prayojanaṃ nāsti sargasya // ISk_66 //
GSP31jaymangu:1792: tataśca saṃyoge 'pi tayoḥ prayojanaṃ nāsti sargasya /
GSP31jaymangu:1797: yadyātmajñānāt kaivalyaprāptiḥ, tadanantarameva śarīraṃ kasmānna nivartata
GSP31jaymangu:1811: yathā kulālavyāpāre nivṛtte 'pi vegavaśāt kiyantamapi kālaṃ cakrabhramastiṣṭhati tathā śarīramapītyarthaḥ // 67 //
GSP31jaymangu:1817: liṅgabhautikaśarīre pṛthagbhūte yathā saṃbhūte layaṃ gati teṣvityarthaḥ (?) //
GSP31jaymangu:1823: satyapi tayoḥ saṃyoge prayojanābhāvānna punaḥ sarga ityātyantikamiti // 68 //
GSP31jaymangu:1837: yatra jñāne bhūtānāṃ brahmādistambaparyantānāṃ sthityādayo vyavasthāpyante /
GSP31jaymangu:1839: sā ca triṣu sthāneṣu daivamānuṣatairyagyoneṣu utpattiḥ sṛṣṭapradhānāt yāvat tanmātrebhyaḥ pañcamahābhūtāni /
GSP31jaymangu:1846: āsurirapi pañcaśikhāya, tena ca bahudhā kṛtaṃ tantram // ISk_70 //
GSP31jaymangu:1853: tatra jñānākhyena bhāvenāndhe tamasi vartamānaṃ jagat dṛṣṭavato muneḥ karuṇotpannā /
GSP31jaymangu:1854: tayā ca preryamāṇa āsuriṃ sagotrabrāhmaṇaṃ varṣasahasrayātinamāgatyovāca /
GSP31jaymangu:1859: tato muninā 'yadi viraktastvam, ehi brahmacaryaṃ cara';
GSP31jaymangu:1861: sa tu pradipadya gṛhasthadharmaṃ tyaktvā pravrajitaḥ /
GSP31jaymangu:1866: āsurirapi tadeva saṃkṣiptaṃ pañcaśikhāya svaśiṣyāyānukampayā pradadau //
GSP31jaymangu:1872: nanu ca ṣaṣṭitantramevāstu kiṃ saptatyeti svaśāstrakaraṇaprayojanamāha-
GSP31jaymangu:1876: munerāsureḥ pañcaśikhastathā gargagautamaprabhṛtirṇarāmataṃgramyā (?) īśvarakṛṣṇanāmānaṃ parivrājakamityanayā śiṣyaparamparayā /
GSP31jaymangu:1886: atra ṣaṣṭitantre bahavo 'rthāḥ, te 'tra noktā ityāha-
GSP31jaymangu:1891: ityādinā granthena ya uktāste kṛtsnasya ṣaṣṭitantrasyāpi //
GSP31jaymangu:1897: paraṃ bandhamokṣopayogino 'rthāḥ darśitā iti tasmāt sampūrṇeyaṃ saptatiriti // 72 //
